TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class DataKeyArray : System.Collections.ICollection, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataKeyArray extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class DataKeyArray Implements ICollection, IStateManager
public ref class DataKeyArray sealed : System::Collections::ICollection, System::Web::UI::IStateManager

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來儲存和管理的集合物件。The class is used to store and manage a collection of objects. A物件都代表資料繫結控制項中的記錄的主索引鍵。A object represents the primary key of a record in a data-bound control. 一般情況下，資料繫結會控制顯示的多筆記錄 (例如控制項) 使用儲存物件控制項中顯示的記錄物件。In general, data-bound controls that display multiple records (such as the control) use a object to store the objects for the records displayed in the control. 類別支援數種方式來存取集合中的項目：The class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - 使用索引子以直接擷取從集合中特定的以零為起始索引處的物件。Use the indexer to directly retrieve a object from the collection at a specific zero-based index. - 使用方法來擷取可用來逐一查看集合的列舉值。Use the method to retrieve an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection. - 使用方法將項目複製到陣列，然後可以用來存取集合中的項目集合中。Use the method to copy the items in the collection into an array, which can then be used to access the items in the collection. 若要判斷集合中的項目總數，請使用屬性。To determine the total number of items in the collection, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用索引子來擷取物件從集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the indexer to retrieve a object from a collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyArrayItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayItem/CS/DataKeyArrayItemcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyArrayItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayItem/VB/DataKeyArrayItemvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何逐一查看集合。The following code example demonstrates how to iterate through a collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyArray#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArray/CS/DataKeyArraycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyArray#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArray/VB/DataKeyArrayvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別使用指定物件。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class using the specified object. 物件包含用來填入集合的物件。The object contains the objects with which to populate the collection.

param.name: array
param.span: 物件之以零起始的陣列，接收複製自集合之項目。

span.span: A zero-based array of objects that receives the copied items from the collection.

param.name: index
param.span: 指定之陣列中要接收複製內容的第一個索引。

span.span: The first index in the specified array to receive the copied contents.

summary.span: 從陣列中的指定索引處開始，複製這個集合中的全部項目至指定的 物件陣列。

span.span: Copies all the items from this collection to the specified array of objects, starting at the specified index in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以將集合配置到指定的陣列，指定索引處開始從複製的項目。Use the method to copy the items from the collection into the specified array, starting at the specified index. 陣列可用來存取集合中的項目。The array can then be used to access the items in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 您必須使用以零為起始的陣列`array`參數。You must use a zero-based array for the `array` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以複製物件從集合的陣列物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the objects from a collection to an array of objects. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyArrayItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayItem/CS/DataKeyArrayItemcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyArrayItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayItem/VB/DataKeyArrayItemvb.aspx#1)]

public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得集合中的項目數目。

span.span: Gets the number of items in the collection.
The number of items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷集合中的項目數。Use the property to determine the number of items in the collection. 屬性通常用於逐一查看集合以判斷其上限繫結時。The property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine its upper bound. 屬性通常也用來判斷集合是否為空白。The property is also commonly used to determine whether a collection is empty. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否集合是空的。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether a collection is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator/CS/DataKeyArrayGetEnumeratorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator/VB/DataKeyArrayGetEnumeratorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回包含集合中所有 物件的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that contains all objects in the collection.

returns.span: 實作的物件，包含集合中所有的 物件。

span.span: An -implemented object that contains all objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來取得列舉值，可以逐一查看以線性方式來存取集合中的每個項目。Use the method to get an enumerator that can be iterated through linearly to access each item in the collection. 若要存取目前列舉值位置的項目，請使用屬性。To access the item at the current position in the enumerator, use the property. 使用移至下一個項目，集合中的方法。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 若要將列舉值移到它的初始位置，使用方法。To move the enumerator to its initial position, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 當您一開始取得列舉值，或使用方法，將列舉值移至第一個項目在集合中，您必須呼叫方法。When you initially get the enumerator or use the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the method. 否則，項目會由未定義屬性。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何逐一查看的列舉值所建立方法。The following code example demonstrates how to iterate through the enumerator created by the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator/CS/DataKeyArrayGetEnumeratorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator/VB/DataKeyArrayGetEnumeratorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否可以修改集合中的項目。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the items in the collection can be modified.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷是否在項目可以修改集合。Use the property to determine whether the items in the collection can be modified. > [!NOTE] > 已覆寫這個屬性永遠傳回`false`、 表示中的物件新增或移除物件。This property has been overridden to always return `false`, to indicate that the objects in the object can be added or removed. 物件本身不能變更。The objects themselves cannot be changed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示 集合是否為同步 (安全執行緒)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷是否物件具備執行緒安全。Use the property to determine whether the object is thread safe. > [!NOTE] > 已覆寫這個屬性永遠傳回`false`表示物件不是安全執行緒。This property has been overridden to always return `false` to indicate that the object is not thread safe. 如需有關屬性，請參閱屬性介面。For more information on the property, see the property of the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將標示要開始追蹤並儲存變更的起始點覆寫這個方法物件做為物件的檢視狀態的一部分。This method is overridden to mark the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the object as part of the object's view state.
